text: "Colonel" Harland David Sanders (September 9, 1890 â€“ December 16, 1980) was an American entrepreneur. He started the company Kentucky Fried Chicken. Sanders was born in Henryville, IndianaThe Human Tradition in the New South By James C. Klotter 130 on September 9, 1890. He studied at Southern University. He was married to Josephine King until they divorced. He later married Claudia Price. Sanders had 3 children. Sanders died at age 90 on December 16, 1980 in Louisville, Kentucky from leukemia and pneumonia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kentucky Fried Chicken * * Category:1890 births Category:1980 deaths Category:People with foods named after them Category:American chief executives Category:Businesspeople from Indiana Category:Businesspeople from Kentucky Category:KFC
title: Colonel Sanders
